sentence: — Sen. Mark Kelly (D-Ariz.) raised nearly $9 million for his reelection bid, plus more fourth-quarter campaign fundraising hauls.
author: Johnson
title: Johnson, Thune fill out Senate puzzle

author: Cameron Arcand
title: Report: Bipartisan Group of Lawmakers Takes on Biden Over Border Crisis

sentence: Some Democrats question wisdom of terminating order Several Senate Democrats — including Mark Kelly and Kyrsten Sinema of Arizona, Joe Manchin of West Virginia, and Maggie Hassan of New Hampshire — have questioned the wisdom of terminating the Title 42 order.
author: Susan Davis
title: Clash over immigration policy derails Senate COVID aid bill

author: Human Events Staff
title: Lawmakers Introduce Bipartisan Bill Requesting Delayed End to Title 42

sentence: Kyrsten Sinema (D-AZ), Mark Kelly (D-AZ), James Lankford (R-OK), John Cornyn (R-TX), Joe Manchin (D-WV), Shelley Moore Capito (R-WV), Jon Tester (D-MT), Rob Portman (R-OH), Maggie Hassan (D-NH), Thom Tillis (R-NC), and John Thune (R-SD) sponsored the legislation.
author: Sean Moran
title: Bipartisan Lawmakers Hope to Slip Amendment to Delay End of Title 42 in Coronavirus Aid

sentence: They were joined by Senators John Cornyn (R-TX), Mark Kelly (D-AZ), John Thune (R-SD), Joe Manchin (D-WV), Shelley Moore Capito (R-WV), Jon Tester (D-MT), Rob Portman (R-OH), Maggie Hassan (D-NH), and Thom Tillis (R-NC).
author: Mike Smith
title: Bipartisan Group of Senators Introduce Bill to Block Termination of Title 42
